title: Sixty years later
brief_description: To mark the Australian visit of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II during the silver jubilee of her reign, Australia’s Navy, Army and Air Force combined to present a massed parade of personnel and colours in front of Parliament House, Canberra on 8 March 1977.
